column2: Have common Icons for nodes in build view

column3:
When there are multiple builds on the build view, each one of them get
its Icon from AbstractViewManager#getIcon, but the icons used are not
consistent with the ones used in ExecutionNode.

This change causes getIcon to use a new function (getEventResultIcon)
that shares the same icons as ExecutionNode#getCurrentIcon. Also, the
icons are defined using constants to cause any change on them to be used
in both functions.
Thank you for the contribution! I've merged the change using the following commit 23b13ba
Have common Icons for nodes in build view
